thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: Arthur Murray

author: Arthur Murray
title: Arthur Murray
text:
We were looking for a holiday and wanted a cruise to New Zealand, something different, so we kept looking on cruisesalefinder, they kept sending us emails. We selected the cruise, did everything on line including deposit and travel insurance. Excellent system, everything worked perfectly.
Seriously, much better and faster than a travel agent. If you know what you are looking for then "go for it" with cruisesalefinder, can't be easier.
